website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful, easy-to-assemble glider and ottoman set that will serve you well for an extended period of time.
pros: Closed ball-bearings ensure smooth gliding and rocking motion
Polyurethane upholstery is plush and simple to clean
Contemporary design helps the glider and ottoman complement any setting's decor
A perfect glider and ottoman set for any nursery
cons: Glider can be wobbly and creaky at times

customer_reviews.title: The chair was relatively easy to put together but it appears either its made ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair was relatively easy to put together but it appears either its made with poor materials or we just got a bad chair. The chair only got moderate use for 5 months before multiple bolts started to get loose and needed to be tightened again. Additionally, many of the wood pieces started to become loose as well so I had to glue them back in. And most recently I noticed that a bunch of the wood pieces was cracked my wife is on the petite side and I have hardly ever sat in it so my opinion is that it is of low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Vail

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chair for 3 months now and it has fallen apart and is unusable. Would give zero stars if possible. Plus this is my second review on this product and still the company has not responded to my email I wrote 2 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Tcycotte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you're 5'6" or under
customer_reviews.text: The back of the chair is too low for me to rest my head back, assembled it measures 38" (not the listed 39.5") and I'm 5'8". I had a chair that was 39.5" high and I could nap in it. That said, I have a bad lower back and this is very comfortable. It's also just slightly wider than some other gliders so that's nice too. My mother is 5'6" and she can rest her head back, so my recommendation is to buy this chair if you're under 5'8". I can still use it, just can't nap.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Earnshaw

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! Bought this glider in October .. A couple months before my baby was due.. And I loved using it for the first two months... I'm a small female (110 lbs) and the springs under the seat cushion, one by one, busted free...leaving a gaping hole. I ended up having to buy a new glider from babies r us.. I guess you get what you pay for! 👎👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product for those who want just a basic one on a budget and it does the job!!!
customer_reviews.text: its been a month now since I am using this product. I like the product. its a good one for the price. its not an over-sized / fancy / high end rocker. However a good product for those who want just a basic one on a budget and it does the job!!! The reason for giving a 4 star is : we have to tie the cushion at the back of the chair and the tie will slide down and thus the cushion too. due to this the back side of the chair is exposed all the time unless we fix it up every time we sit.
customer_reviews.author: Sanal Ponganamoola Babu

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged right out of the box. Foot stool wood was split in half.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Construction is very poor quality . . . wobbly . . . unstable . . . cheap fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these gliders. After my husband assembled one of them, I asked him to not assemble the 2nd one. The construction is very poor quality, wobbly, and unstable. Fabric is quite cheap looking. I’d be embarrassed for a guest to be seated in it, and doubly so if a guest sat in it and it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a few months, then the quality deteriorates quickly
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a few months, then the quality deteriorates quickly. My wife started using this product early March to rock our child asleep, and it worked well for a while. Now, despite retightening the bolts, it still creaks, and makes a popping noise, when barely rocking and not even getting close to the ends of the track, so less than 6 mth of real use and I already need something better, which is unfortunate, because I initially liked this product. Problem is displayed in the attached video.
customer_reviews.author: Logan k Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I like this chair. It looks cute in the nursery and is great for rocking to sleep or nursing. Customer service is bad. We just moved and the seat cushion got lost in the shuffle. I emailed them asking to purchase a new seat cushion and they very rudely responded that I was outside the time frame for a return (which is not what I asked for as i bought this chair in 2017), and they do not sell replacement parts. So now my chair is useless. What a shame and a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Functions well, but it definitely has an overall feel consistent with the price (let's be real, though -- this wasn't crazy expensive, so I'm not expecting pure luxury at all). The headrest slides down a bit when it's tied the way that it recommends, but we adjusted the way that we tied it on so it stays in place much better. Smooth glide and great for feeding the baby. The side pockets are nice, and fortunately durable enough to withstand the attempts our 3-year-old has made to climb up using them as footholds.
customer_reviews.author: Dawggj

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this rocker about 6 months, bought it for my baby’s nursery while still pregnant. At first I really liked it, it’s comfortable and was a good value. However, now that we’ve used it a while I wish we’d picked something different. The glider is a bit noisy, lots of creaky wood when you move so not great for rocking the baby to sleep. The height of the arms of the rocker makes it difficult to nurse the baby because she’s either kicking the arm rest or I’m having to try to stuff a pillow by her head so she doesn’t hit it on the arm rest as there’s not a lot of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: hrsc

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete cushions and squeaks
customer_reviews.text: The bottom and back cushions wear pretty easily. I purchased the chair when I was 8 months pregnant, my little one is 9 months. The chair is barely used bc it's in the nursery (for use reference) and I bed share. So I'd hope the cushions would last a little longer. Also, it now makes a really loud squeaking sound when I rock it, so as of now, it's no use for trying to put the baby to sleep. I only use it for story time now.
customer_reviews.author: KMarie

customer_reviews.title: Classic Glider and Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: The like new brown cloth on black wood frame glider I got went together in minutes. It looks great, and I'm sure going to enjoy having it as a reading chair in my bedroom. I would not recommend this particular model chair for an adult over, say, 220 lbs, and that is my opinion based on how lightweight the wood frame is. But I counter my opinion with the fact that the bolts solidly hold the back and arms in place. And the ottoman works great as designed too.
customer_reviews.author: Always Write

customer_reviews.title: It will get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in preparation for our baby on the way. I’ve had this chair now almost 2 years and I can say for the use with a newborn this was a great buy. The material used is soft. The cushion used is pretty sturdy and the glide was smooth. If you want cushions near putter hip area this is not the chair for you. The main thing I didn’t like was how the cushions back part slides down and over time does give out. Would recommend this chair for someone who needs it for a newborn or foe short term uses as in 1-3 years. After that I’m guess you willl need to replace cushioning or discard chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mama-to-a-Gem

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but it came broken
customer_reviews.text: I love this rocker, it looks like it will be comfortable and perfect for my nursery. However, taking it out of the box we discovered a broken piece. We were going to still try to keep it, so we didn't have to go through the hassle of trying to get a refund/ new one shipped out. Then we realized the broken piece was a support piece. Hoping to get this resolved soon, so I can rock my baby to sleep in comfort. Update: My new glider came promptly, its comfortable and works well. The seller resolved my issue quickly. Thank you !!!!
customer_reviews.author: TeganWilkin

customer_reviews.title: Not Even Close to What is Pictured
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. It looks so plush and comfortable in the photo. It now sits in my bedroom. The color is nothing like the photo and the seat cushions are thin, flat and the material looks dull and used. It looked that way when I first put it together. Do yourself a favor and buy something nicer for your house.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: Marginal comfort and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well ahead of Amazon's estimated delivery date. It was relatively easy to assemble, but alignment was a challenge. You must loosen the armtests to get holes to align to back. But the worst is that one of the snaps for the armrest cover is missing. It was nevewr installed in the cover. So we have a choice - live with the armrest not fully attached or go through the pain of trying to return it. There's no number to call for support. Not at all recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K. Christie

customer_reviews.title: A good chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay chair. For the price, it's great, but overall, I wish we would've spent more money on something more comfortable and sturdy. It was super easy to assemble, which was nice. But it's a little rickety. If you lean to the left of right to grab something, you practically have a heart attack because it starts to tip over. And with a newborn in your arms, that's just a no no. It isn't very comfortable either. Wish we would've gotten a lazy boy instead.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, the print on fabric does have some small smudges that don't bother me and one hole joining the arm to the bottom of the chair was cut too small so I bag to scrape it out with a key in order to get it together. Still very happy with it for the price. Update: I was so in love with this but now I can't shift my weight at all without terrible creaking... Really wish I would have spent more money and gotten something higher quality. Also, the footrest is discolored/dirty from my socks/feet being on it and it's not really easily cleanable. I've removed a star for those problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... senior citizen who wanted a rocking chair and I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I am a small senior citizen who wanted a rocking chair and I love this chair. It is very comfortable and it glides really well. I have problems with my legs and the ottoman fits me perfectly. Would recommend this to anyone who wants a glider chair. Made exceptionally well.
customer_reviews.author: linda l ameika

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Update- Changing my review to 1 star due to the fact that there is a huge tip over risk. I can’t even hold my baby and reach for something to the left or right without it almost falling over. Seems like a huge liability to me. I’m thankful my baby hasn’t been injured. Chair has storage pouches that snap over the arm rests. One of the pouches I received is missing two snaps so it only partially attaches to the chair. Other than that issue the chair is good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mozolic

customer_reviews.title: Small and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sweet little chair, perfect for rocking the grandbabies. Note that it's quite small (perfect size for me at 5'1" and 135 pounds). I'd think a big man would either not fit in it at all or break it. For me, it's just right. It has a soft, cozy look and feel. My only complaint is, when it was first assembled it stank to high heaven of chemicals, gave me a sinus headache. I swabbed the wood down with a mixture of alcohol, vinegar and olive oil, and that seems to have helped.
customer_reviews.author: docmcr

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service and uncomfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this chair, and not happy with the customer service from this seller. I feel uncomfortable and unstable in this chair, and I think the quality isn't great. Seller is requiring that I pay for both return shipping as well as a 20% restock fee. Update 2/2/2018: Extremely costly to pay for return shipping, almost the cost of the chair. So, buyers be aware of that in case you don't like the chair. Originally gave 1 star but changed to 2 stars, because subsequent customer service was very good.
customer_reviews.author: KTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Worried about cracks
customer_reviews.text: The chair was easy to put together and is quite comfortable, but it seems pretty inevitable that these cracks will eventually cause a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to check the outside of the box for the correct color.
customer_reviews.text: This was a baby shower gift. I was initially so impressed with the fast delivery but the excitement didn’t last too long because the wrong color was shipped. I wanted the black/brown and received the grey/white instead. We kept the wrong color because the shower was two days away. It’s disappointing because I had to reveal the gift before the shower. So my daughter in law accepted the glider. She is enjoying the chair with our new granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Ms B

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the size of these! The seat has kept its shape and hasn't 'gone flat' like so many of the other cushions. Very easy to assemble, only took 7 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best deals we have gotten. Most gliders are well over $200, so we jumped on this one when we saw it was under $150. Although the cushioning is a little thin, the quality is great. We have a new baby, so this glider has come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: It's okay! Good value, medium quality
customer_reviews.text: It's okay!! A little small for my average sized husband, good for my petite self (well I'm hoping I'll be back on the petite side again once baby arrives...). It was a great price for an item that we only expect to use for so long, and it matches the nursery I did not find many options with white wood and ivory cushions at this lower price point.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Wont buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother had a similar chair i loved so we bought one for the nursery. However the seat cusion didnt last. Became very flat. Also the gears started making cracking noise. Didnt help when trying to rock a baby to sleep. Would buy a different brand. My grandmothers lasted for ever. This one did not.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah DeFord

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to assemble, so comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Super cute and easy to assemble. Not too big for baby nursery. Love the pockets kmon the sides. This price beats the slightly larger ones that cost 400 to 500 bucks. Super comfortable. I didn't wanna get out of it after I assembled. So cheap, I'm considering buying another for the living room. Fyi holds up to 250 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Krapkat

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother. Cheap and weak
customer_reviews.text: We just put this chair together and while sitting back in it, the back support beams snapped with little pressure. My husband has to duct tape it. I don’t think I’ll be using it at all when my baby is born. I’m upset that I spent so much on a horribly cheap chair. Should have went with another company for a higher price for better quality’s would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shania jonlene

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful. But, although the back cushion is thick and comfortable, the seat cushion is thin and after a short time, sitting becomes uncomfortable. I put a throw pillow on the seat and it helps, but not entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box and assembled in 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase! The ottoman and the base of the chair came fully assembled. All we had to do was add the chair back and arms. Such an easy assembly process. I bought a similar but cheaper chair for my sister in law last year and it came fully disassembled...would have spent a few dollars more in hindsight for the ease of assembly. Go with this brand instead of the cheaper option! The color is wonderful, the cushions are soft and supportive, and they have a smooth suede texture that feel luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas tesi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this glider rocker for pumping milk and nursing our newborn. It is very comfortable and sturdy. The side pockets are perfect for water bottles (a must-have, since nursing and pumping make you ungodly thirsty), extra burping cloths, and holding your phone or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: AntigoneRisen

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better quality chair
customer_reviews.text: We bought this about a month ago. It worked well enough, but a spring came out of the wood. It was very hard to get back in, and it's unclear how long it will remain. Our kids had their third and last child, and didn't want to spend a lot. We should have spent more, and gotten better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Belding

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together. The color is just as pictured and is pretty comfy. Bought it for my mom and she said she liked it. If anything faulty happens I'll update my review but currently she is loving the chair. Also the side pockets make it easy to keep track of the remote and knitting items.
customer_reviews.author: N3dD

customer_reviews.title: And the gliding stopped...
customer_reviews.text: Well it lasted for a few months. My husband was rocking our 3 month old in the glider, the left arm of the chair fell down from the bottom of the chair, and the gliding stopped (can’t fix this). Luckily I bought my husband a rocking recliner for Christmas and just let him open it today so we could rock our baby. I hate that this chair did that, we loved this chair. By the way no one got hurt, thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great Glider
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and functions quite nicely! Aside from being a comfortable glider with pads on the arm rests. This is immensely helpful when resting an arm there with a baby on it! Also the customer service by Naomi was very helpful and did everything in there power to make sure that I was satisfied the entire way through the buying of the product! I would recommend this glider to any pattern in the market or really anyone that is looking for a comfortable glider that is built well enough to last for years to come! Oh and the price was pretty good as well for what you are getting!
customer_reviews.author: Nick38

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build, but doesn't seem well made.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build but the material overall seems cheep. If you are a larger person i would not get this out of fear of it breaking !!!. If you are smaller/avg this could work well for you as long as you don't abuse it. I am avg size person and haven't had any issues but i worry about it breaking while in use. The cloth/setting material has an odd smell and i would not expect to to last well in a washer.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: ... because we already had a recliner rocker but I'm glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: I was on the edge about getting this because we already had a recliner rocker but I'm glad I got this. We've had this for almost a year now and it's in great condition and works great. We love it and use it ALL the time. Very comfy too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Assembly a Big Plus
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a mother-to-be who assembled this chair and foot rest with ease. It was delivered promptly in excellent condition and according to the picture my daughter in law provided, it looks perfect in the setting she chose. I would not hesitate to recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ShireFox

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the lack of comfort. Purchased other brands and loved them but they did not have the color I wanted so I purchased this one. The very thin and narrow arm cushions slide off and your elbow hits the hard wood under it. The ottoman is not level so it bangs back and forth when rocking. Neighbor downstairs would go crazy with the noise! Color and look is very nice if the manufacturer could improve these other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: The Naomi Home Brisbane Glider & Ottoman Set came without the bolts or instructions to put the chair together. When I explained this to the seller, I was offered only to return the item. At 9 months pregnant, sending the chair back is a hassle. I wish they would have given the option to send the bolts and instructions as thats all that is missing. Definitely wish it was handled differently. I was really excited about the glider.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jackson-Frazer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with my purchase! This glider arrived the day after I ordered it, over a week early! I ordered the white with dark gray cushions. Easy to put together and very comfy. I can't comment on its longevity because I just received it today. Regarding previous reviews about the back cushion sliding down, I tied it to the top bar, not the vertical bars on the back. It will not slide down that way and looks no different.
customer_reviews.author: Lkj

customer_reviews.title: Glad it was a gift
customer_reviews.text: Decent chair. wood is very roughly finished other than arms and back. Part of the stool foot snapped and sheered off of the stool after catching on the rug while being moved. Started squeaking about a week of use. I added two custom foam cushions for better support I can’t imagine it’ll last more than a year or two of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with the Glider
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for our daughter and son and law a year ago. And now we use ours when our granddaughter comes over to help her fall asleep. Its easy to get out of when baby is sleeping (unlike a a regular chair or recliner). The assembly took about 15 - 20 minutes. Happy Happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far I've been impressed with this chair. Relatively easy to put together with an Allen wrench (included). After reading previous reviews, I inspected all the pieces before putting it together. I didn't find any flaws. The pockets will be very useful. The glider glides smoothly and the cushions are comfortable. Some reviewers said that the back cushion slouches, but if you tie the ties around the top this shouldn't be a problem- don't tie around vertical back bars or it will side down. Fits nicely in a small corner in my nursery. I'll come back after further use and update my review if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was really concerned about ordering any kind of rocker off of Amazon after reading all of the reveiws and horror stories. I finally decided to go with this one because I liked the look and it seemed to have high markings (originally I wanted to get something closer to a rocking recliner). The rocker was delivered quickly. I held my breath as I opened the package, praying nothing was broken, and was pleased to find everything was intact and all pieces accounted for. The chair was extremely easy to set up. A couple people complained about the back cushion falling down... tie it to the top of the rocker rather then the straight slats... problem solved
customer_reviews.author: Amanda kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Easily assembled, looks great, very comfortable for my 5'4" frame. The top (headrest area) is the perfect height for napping when you fall asleep with baby. LOVE this chair! 4 stars instead of five only due to quality/ durability. It sometimes creaks and I'm afraid it will break if someone weighs a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Worst Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This has been the worst company to work with for customer service. My chair arrived with a fabric side that is missing snaps that hold it in place. When I contacted the company and asked them to send just the one side piece of fabric, they continually told me over and over to return the entire chair. I only wanted a new side piece of fabric that worked, in order to use the chair fully. The chair is overall nice and glides well. However, based on the way the company provides customer service, I’m advising others not to purchase their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I look forward to to using this chair!
customer_reviews.text: I have a daughter on the way and I'm very much looking forward to using this chair. It was super easy to assemble. It seems to have fabric that would be easy to clean if there were leaks or spills. I also love the pockets on the side and that the cushion on the back goes all the way up so you can comfortably rest your head against it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Color way off
customer_reviews.text: Color is way odd feom cream we ordered. Daughter in law said it was ok so won't make a big deal of it. Was hesitant do to reviews but so far ok. Seems comfortable to a 5ft 3 inch mom. Head rest on the back ok. Hopefully it last. I did buy the insurance just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Amazon

customer_reviews.title: I’m not a paid reviewer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my gf and our newborn daughter, it came in a kinda dinged up box but all the wood was protected. Came in big pieces- took maybe 30 mins to assemble. ONLY issue, the cousin is a bit thin and can get uncomfortable for long useage.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, great glider!
customer_reviews.text: It came mostly assembled. Just about 8 hex-nuts and 10 minutes after opening, we were gliding! And the baby loves it. Kicking ourselves for not having this from birth. We got the chocolate/black one, because it more closely matches our furniture. We love it, and it's no worse than ones that sell for about 50% more locally. In face the back feels more padded than the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: IZ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rocker
customer_reviews.text: I really love this rocker! I bought it for my baby's nursery, and I think the design and quality are great for the price. The gliding action is very smooth and quiet, and the cushions are comfy. It'll be perfect for rocking and nursing my little one when she arrives. I purchased the white and cream color, though the cushions are more tan than cream.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky K.

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Looked like a great chair, but after just 2 weeks, the chair started rubbing in places causing noisy rocking. Not good when your trying to rock a baby to sleep. I would spend a little more money for a quality chair. This is built very poorly
customer_reviews.author: Joseph David

customer_reviews.title: Chair glider not safe.
customer_reviews.text: Very much dissatisfied. See attached photo. Bought this glider in August for my great grandson that was born in November of 2019. This is very dangerous when a back bar snaps. I expect for the money that I paid be refunded or send me a New one. If they all would have snapped at the same time then they would be serious injuries to both my granddaughter and great grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Judith latalladi

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for grandma because her old rocking chair broke. I think she likes it. She sits on it everyday and watches Netflix. I don't know the comfort level myself so I can't rate that, but it was easy for me to assemble and it does its job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Merr Peng

customer_reviews.title: This is the second rocker we have bought within less ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second rocker we have bought within less than 1 year. The first rocker the springs fell out of the bottom of the seat and would not go back in place. The second rocker the glider portion is starting to wiggle. If you are going to buy this rocker by the protection plan too so you can at least get it fixed when it does break. Because it WILL!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Tips sideways easily
customer_reviews.text: It tips over sideways very easily! I love this chair, but if you have young children that climb, I wouldn't suggest it. Even elderly people probably shouldn't buy this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Katster

customer_reviews.title: The chair works really well and the baby loves being ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair works really well and the baby loves being rocked in it. The cushions on the chair are not that thick and I find my bottom going numb. We are looking at making something different for the chair. Side pockets are a huge help for burb rags, cell phone, etc
customer_reviews.author: Deborah MyersMyers

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not to awfully bad for the price, took 45 minutes from unboxing to fully assembled. Wish it was a little more comfortable. But decent for the price
customer_reviews.author: R. Adam Estep

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is good buy, i read bad reviews about it where said is seat and back cushions were no good, if you weigh over 240 pounds maybe , but thats not the seat, thats your overweight, def will recomend
customer_reviews.author: lazaro jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: Bought the espresso/tan chair. The chair is an ok chair. But the arm rests suck. The cushioning doesn't cover the whole arm and the fabric is so loose they fall to the side. The cushion on the arms and seat isn't very thick either. Just seems cheaply made. I would not buy again and would not recommend to anyone else unless you are desperate.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieA

customer_reviews.title: POS do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage do not buy. The chair is in even and the stool so they clunk not glide. The bearings are crappy, the so called padded arm rest are a tiny piece of foam that just slides around. The seat foam cushions were smashed and are about as thin as the arm rest. Absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Randi Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great glider and ottoman for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair and ottoman for our nursery. The baby is not born yet, so I am using this in the living room for now. It's great! Very comfortable, and great quality especially for the price paid. I got the gray and white chevron fabric with the white wood. The fabric seems like it will be easy to wipe and keep clean. I really like the side pockets too, very handy to hold a book, your phone, and/or remotes.
customer_reviews.author: christopher j westwood

customer_reviews.title: This was extremely easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to put together, my husband had it assembled in 20 minutes. I wish it was the back was taller which is why I didn't give it a 5 star review. I had read other reviews saying that for someone 5'8" their head should hit the back to the chair, this only happens if I don't sit up straight and I'm 5'8". The bottom cushion could be a little thicker and softer (it's exactly as pictured though)
customer_reviews.author: Sami Hanzalik

customer_reviews.title: A little less than expected, but good enough for now
customer_reviews.text: We bought another glider rocking chair similar to this on Amazon and this was is simply ok. The padding seems a bit cheap, especially on the footstool, but otherwise it's fine. I don't anticipate this thing will last anything more than a few years, but since it's for our infant, it shouldn't matter much.
customer_reviews.author: Kannon30

customer_reviews.title: The chair is very comfortable. I love the neutral colors
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very comfortable. I love the neutral colors. It appears to be quite sturdy. The only downsides to this glider are that the arm padding easily slides off center and you lose out of some of that cushion and there are some cuts in the wood from assembly where there probably shouldn't be. It's not super noticeable but when spending as much time as I did in this chair, I noticed it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ellickson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great chair for the price. I am 5'1" and my husband is 5'11" and we both fit comfortably. The padding is nice and I like the color too. Just like picture.
customer_reviews.author: Scgali

customer_reviews.title: A good for less than 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom 2 years ago, and here I am looking for a replacement, need to oil it every 6 months to keep it from squeaking and its gotten real uncomfortable for her the cushions lost support.
customer_reviews.author: R. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Broken less than 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Springs are not good already lost 2 of them, gave this to my daughter for Christmas after having twins in October and it's terrible
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Too small & seller is not helpful on issues.
customer_reviews.text: Very small. The pads are very uncomfortable and make the seating space to smile. Not good quality. Seller is not helpful when issues arise.
customer_reviews.author: SJTopaz

customer_reviews.title: Just what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Pillows are medium quality, but the rocking chair works great! Baby and I love to sit here and the little pockets are great for storing anything you need quick access to (books, burp cloths, etc) as long as it's not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Wild

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfortable and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair knowing I would soon be watching a new grandchild.I don't know what I would do with out it.It is used to feed the baby and then rock her to sleep.It is very comfortable and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen w.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in my living room.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Great quality.. Very soothing.. Gentle swaying.. Very comfortable.. I see these recommended for baby's room.. Very therapeutic and everyone should have one..
customer_reviews.author: Pats

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were diagrams...had to switch one or two things around but basically pretty easy to follow. End result...great gift, well recieved!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Chan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: great buy, bought for someone else but also received myself and really enjoy using to read and put my baby to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good buy, will buy more
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable, and easy to assemble. The seat cushion has flat springs under it, not just a wood bottom to the seat. The fabric seams to be light weight grade so we'll see how it holds up. I would prefer the back height a few inches taller, but I'm 6'2". There are handy pockets on both of the arm rest covers.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not that great..
customer_reviews.text: The fabric & cushion covering for the armrests slides off after a few uses, and was also sewn poorly (didn't stay centered on top of the armrest) in the chair we received. Would recommend just getting a wooden rocking chair vs. these gliders for the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Viren & Sheila

customer_reviews.title: VERY BAD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I bought the chair in December because it was a gift for my husband, but my baby was born in April. We have been using the table for 4 months and it has already damaged, I bought the chair in December because it was a gift for my husband, but my baby was born in April. We have been using the table for 4 months and it has already damaged, VERY BAD QUALITY
customer_reviews.author: Paula V Vallejo

customer_reviews.title: Decent glider
customer_reviews.text: The first rocker arrived with the footstool broken. However the customer support issued a refund quickly after we sent it back. Sucked that they couldn’t just send us a replacement rocker. However this second one came fine and went together quickly. It did throw us off as the footstool is shorter than the seat height, but otherwise it’s a solid rocker. So far it’s held up well.
customer_reviews.author: DShoales

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER easy to assemble comes in like 8 large parts just so it fits better in a box. Had it together in 15 minutes. Does NOT weigh much so its easy to move from room to room. Likewise, it is so lightweight that a heavier person may feel uncomfortable, but I feel it is sturdy enough to hold about 300 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: B G

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: The material is so soft and at the same time very fun as you need it to be. The most wonderful rockin' motion Made Easy with ottoman besides getting to put your feet up.
customer_reviews.author: Chase L.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my wife and she likes it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she likes it. I have no problem with the quality although it did come with a minor flaw. I called customer service three times and left a message as instructed. I have yet to hear from anyone and so I finally gave up. The product is okay, but customer service is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice, inexpensive chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair had mix reviews but we decided to give it a shot. Overall we are very pleased. Pretty basic to put together and overall a nice quality. We would recommend it. It did have a few scratches on it but nothing you can see without looking closely to find.
customer_reviews.author: A&F

customer_reviews.title: You have to put it together
customer_reviews.text: We love the chair. It is exactly as it was described. It is very comfortable. The only downfall with this chair is that it doesn't swivel or rock. I would buy it again and it came earlier than we thought we would.
customer_reviews.author: A J Kent

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable except....
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to sit and nurse baby in. Easy to put together. Only giving it 4 stars due to the seat back height. I'm 5'7" and could use another 3" or so, so I could rest my head. This is a huge draw back since I spend so much time late at night in it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Oldham

customer_reviews.title: Color is darker on the cream and FedEx delivery was a pain
customer_reviews.text: It's a really great chair, no broken pieces, easy to set up! The only issue we had was the cream color, it is a bit darker than we thought but it still works. We also had an issue with delivery but it was a FedEx issue. All around we are happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent chair that's good in price but it's not as comfortable as other ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent chair that's good in price but it's not as comfortable as other rocking chairs that I've tried at stores. It is much more of a bargain in price than those chairs as well, and didn't want to spend that much on a temporary piece of furniture. It's a good price, and easy to build, just the comfort level is why I gave it 3 stars, but I like super plush comfortable chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Frausto

customer_reviews.title: This is a great chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! it was easy to put together very comfortable and it looks great in my family room.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi G

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. I’m quite short (4’10”) and it’s the perfect size for me to rock my baby. His dad, grandmothers, and aunt, who range in size up to almost 6’ tall and 250 lbs, all say it’s comfortable and easy to get in and out of. I love this rocker and I hope to keep it well after the kid needs rocking to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Izzi

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this glider! Use it daily
customer_reviews.text: This glider is great I love it! It's super comfy for when I need to breastfeed and rock my baby to sleep. There were no issues with assembly. I find it sturdy enough for the price and actually feel that it is well made. The footrest is great as well and I love the compartments on the side that I use for books, burp rags, etc. The cushions are comfy as well but I throw a couple little pillows on it too. Love this rocker it was a gift from my mom and has turned out to be very useful, convenient, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: alandry

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review products, but this one exceeded my expectations and I have already recommended it to 3 people, 2 of whom sat in it in my home. But it is not for tall people. I am 5'3" and the chair is VERY comfortable. My husband is 5'11" and the top of the chair comes to his shoulders. He said it's comfortable, but he probably wouldn't sit in it for an extended period. Most of the chair was assembled so putting the rest of it together was remarkably easy. I got the espresso/cream color and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my aching legs
customer_reviews.text: This glider chair and ottoman set are perfect for my small bedroom. The rocking motion helps relax my aching legs. Well constructed, very comfortable and easy to put together. Outstanding customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beethoven49

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all nurseries!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife and baby, have had it for a little over a month now and has been great for us. I don't know about all the other reviewers but I was very detailed in checking quality and I am very happy with it. My wife is 5'2 125 lbs and she finds it very comfortable, I am 5'8 220lbs and I am very comfortable using it. I would highly recommend. comfy chair and very stylish looking. AND mine doesn't squeak, as I saw some reviewers complaining about that.
customer_reviews.author: NYCLerka

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.text: 8 bolts (allen wrench included), 4 pads..... Assembled! We have bought 2 of these. One for our son and daughter in law and another for us because we liked it so much! All good!
customer_reviews.author: AthensEd

customer_reviews.title: 1) Excellent service provided Naomi Home Brisbane Glider
customer_reviews.text: 1) Excellent service provided Naomi Home Brisbane Glider. Addressed our questions and replied our emails very quick. 2) Easy for assembly 3) It is very light. You may not think about it when you purchase but it is very important, especially you may need to move it from time to time 4) Good design. My father in law is about 5'10'' and my wife is about 5'2. Both of them feel it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mugushi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Chair was put together two mins before my daughter arrived! I have had it over a year now. Still comfortable, it make a little noise when gliding now but not loud. My baby will be one in June and I still put her to sleep in it ever night.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Less Comfortable Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice for the price, but really is not very comfortable. I'm only 5 ft. 1" 120 lbs. and the bottom seat part feels quite small. The pad for the seat is also very stiff. Overall, I'm not very happy... I don't think there's even enough room to comfortably breastfeed baby. I am already looking for a new chair, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: HealthyMama

product_meta.title: Naomi Home Brisbane Glider and Ottoman Set White/Cream
product_meta.description: Color:White/CreamGlide your way to relaxation and serenity with the Naomi home Brisbane glider ottoman set this beautiful glider and ottoman set is classically designed to be a perfect fit in the nursery and to transition to the living room or den as your child grows enjoy putting up your feet on the matching ottoman to read while watching your little one sleep or during bed time stories the smooth gliding motion helps you and baby unwind during those late night feedings or fussy bed times the beautiful glider and ottoman set offers plenty of comfort with its generous seating room and padded arms sure to be a favorite this ideal glider and ottoman combination will add comfort and style to any room enjoy the best with the inviting cushions and incredibly smooth rocking motion of the Naomi home Brisbane glider ottoman set.
feature_bullets: Color Cushion Color : Cream; Finish : White
Product Dimensions Glider: 39.5 " H x 25.75 “W; x 24.75” D; Weight: 38 lbs. Ottoman Dimensions: 14.5 " H x 16.0 “W x 20.5” D; Weight: 12.0 Lb.
Material / Construction Solid wooden frame makes Glider and Ottoman stability and durability. Closed Ball-bearings for smooth gliding and rocking motion.
COMFORT: Generous seating room with thick cushions for maximum comfort and pockets to hold your belongings. Comes with matching Ottoman. Fill Material: 100 % Polyurethane Foam Easy spot cleanable.
Assembly Beautiful and easy to assemble furniture that is ideal glider rocker for your nursery. Required tool set included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,597 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
